question:
Swasthya Raksha Programme:
  1. is an initiative from Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
  2. has been launched to promote health and health education in urban areas
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: First statement is incorrect because the Swasthya Raksha Programme is an initiative from Ministry of AYUSH. Second statement is again incorrect because it has been launched to promote health and health education in villages.
